mapper.insert: insert into ec_cust_endorse (endor_apply_no, cust_no, endor_accept_no, endor_no, proposal_no, endor_appli_date, endor_eff_date, endor_sts, endor_reason_no, produce_flg, chg_premium, chg_amount, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{endorApplyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endorAcceptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proposalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endorAppliDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endorEffDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endorSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endorReasonNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{produceFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chgPremium,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{chgAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ec_cust_endorse set endor_accept_no = #{endorAcceptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endor_no = #{endorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proposal_no = #{proposalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endor_appli_date = #{endorAppliDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endor_eff_date = #{endorEffDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endor_sts = #{endorSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endor_reason_no = #{endorReasonNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, produce_flg = #{produceFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chg_premium = #{chgPremium,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, chg_amount = #{chgAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where endor_apply_no = #{endorApplyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select endor_apply_no, cust_no, endor_accept_no, endor_no, proposal_no, endor_appli_date, endor_eff_date, endor_sts, endor_reason_no, produce_flg, chg_premium, chg_amount, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_cust_endorse where endor_apply_no = #{endorApplyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select endor_apply_no, cust_no, endor_accept_no, endor_no, proposal_no, endor_appli_date, endor_eff_date, endor_sts, endor_reason_no, produce_flg, chg_premium, chg_amount, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_cust_endorse

select endor_apply_no, cust_no, endor_accept_no, endor_no, proposal_no, endor_appli_date, endor_eff_date, endor_sts, endor_reason_no, produce_flg, chg_premium, chg_amount, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_cust_endorse where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rec_stat ='0'
and concat(endor_apply_no,endor_accept_no,endor_no,proposal_no) like concat('%', #{endorApplyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
